title: 구어체 조건 표현 - 가정적 조건
description: 가정적 상황을 자연스럽게 표현하는 원어민 수준의 구어체 조건 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: If I were you, I wouldn't have done that.
If I had known then, I would've acted differently.
If something like that happens, what would you do?
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 가정적 조건 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 만약에 내가 너라면, 그렇게 하지 않았을 거야.
sentences.en: If I were you, I wouldn't have done that.
If I had known then, I would've acted differently.

sentences.kr: 만약 그런 일이 생긴다면, 어떻게 할 거야?
sentences.en: If something like that happens, what would you do?

sentences.kr: 시간을 되돌릴 수 있다면, 그 선택을 바꿀 텐데.
sentences.en: If I could turn back time, I'd change that decision.
If the situation had been different, the outcome would've been different too.

sentences.kr: 만약 기회가 또 온다면, 꼭 잡을 거야.
sentences.en: If another opportunity comes up, I'll definitely take it.

sentences.kr: 그 사람이 여기 있었다면, 뭐라고 했을까?
sentences.en: If that person were here, what do you think they'd say?

sentences.kr: 운명을 바꿀 수 있다면, 뭘 바꾸고 싶어?
sentences.en: If you could change fate, what would you want to change?
